body_html:
I've always run tfdbg with a maximized window, but even then this doesn't happen all the time.

Changing the screen width doesn't seem to do anything (in general, tfdbg doesn't really resize when I resize my window).
body_text:
I've always run tfdbg with a maximized window, but even then this doesn't happen all the time.
Changing the screen width doesn't seem to do anything (in general, tfdbg doesn't really resize when I resize my window).
body:
I've always run `tfdbg` with a maximized window, but even then this doesn't happen all the time.

Changing the screen width doesn't seem to do anything (in general, `tfdbg` doesn't really resize when I resize my window).
